column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////DH and I rarely get a Saturday date night out these days so
column3: we like it to be special. Well
column4: let me say that from the minute we walked in the door to the minute we left
column5: we were treated exceptionally well (most notably when the hostess almost sat us next to two women who were dining with a BABY but realized before we even said anything that this would be a less than ideal table for a romantic night out--that's why we left our baby at home--and moved us to a quieter table next to Mr. Sodikoff himself) and enjoyed (almost*) everything.
